name: Coblox
description:
Play and work on your concentration at the same time, thanks to Coblox!

The goal is simple: Fill the shape at the center by using the blocks which are on screen!

With Coblox, YOU GET:
- A simple and accessible concept with gradual difficulty so that it still provides a real challenge for more experienced players!
- More than 2000 different levels!
- The ability to play at any time and from anywhere!
- An effective way to exercise your brain and your concentration!
- Daily rewards!

NOTES
- Coblox contains ads and in-app purchases.
